name: incorrectly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is not correct or true: For many years the sculpture was incorrectly thought to be by Donatello. He claims that his remarks were incorrectly reported.
in a way that is not acceptable or not as it should be: I apologize if I behaved incorrectly or inappropriately. Shareholders can get rid of a board member if he or she acts incorrectly. See
incorrect
More examplesFewer examplesThe gold medal was incorrectly awarded to Irina Karavaeva.A faulty DNA test incorrectly determined that a British man was not the father.Mr Harris had admitted that he acted incorrectly.Girls should have the power to say no - to their peers, or to an adult who is behaving incorrectly.
